repository.corpname: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

did.unittitle: Stanford University, School of Earth Sciences, honors theses

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Stanford University. School of Earth Sciences

did.abstract: Honors theses written by undergraduates in the Stanford University School of Earth Sciences.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of honors theses written by undergraduates in the Stanford University School of Earth Sciences.

accessrestrict.head: Access to Collection
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research; materials must be requested at least 48 hours in advance of intended use. No photocopies may be made.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: Copyright is retained by the creator for materials they have authored or otherwise produced. Transmission or reproduction of materials requires the written permission of the copyright owner.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Stanford University, School of Earth Sciences, Honors Theses (SC4-2513). Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Theses were transferred to the Stanford University Archives from the Hume Writing Center in 2011.

controlaccess.subject: Earth sciences -- Study and teaching.

Kent-Corson, Malinda, "Cenozoic surface elevation in southwestern Montana and eastern Idaho: a stable isotope study"
